MANAGED SERVICES

Trust all of your IT needs to Paranet

We invest in best-in-class tools so you don’t have to. Paranet backs you up with a service desk staffed 24/7 – available anytime, by phone, email or the web.

Approach

How do we do this?

We use remote management and automation, meaning you don’t have to have a full-time staff on-premise. Then our team of experts monitors it all – your desktops, your servers, your network – around the clock to make sure your environment is always operating at its peak.

So while we reduce your IT operating costs, we also remove the worries of day-to-day operations.

"We understand that Managing IT is complex, especially when it's not your core business. So leave it to us - it’s what we do."

You build your business network. We'll take care of your computing network.

Explore

Many of the world’s most successful companies count on Paranet to manage their projects and serve their technology needs. Across industry verticals, Paranet has proven to be a trusted technology partner.

Core Pillars

Save time and money by switching from in-house services to a managed IT services company.

Business Continuity

Business Continuity is more than physical recovery from a disaster, natural or otherwise. Paranet can provide the data resilience your company needs to recover from outages due to natural disasters, foreign or domestic attacks, hackers or malware.

Infrastructure Management

Our technical staff manages, monitors and optimizes your core computing infrastructure from servers, storage to data.

Network Management

We assess your current networks for best practices and remediation. Then we evaluate your future telephony and data needs and tailor a plan to meet them. We make sure they’re always optimized and secure with regular security audits.

User Management

Paranet’s user management services relieve the burden of maintaining desktop computers and user access. Our staff uses remote management software to deploy desktop upgrades, patches and applications.

Best-in-class Partners

Unrivaled Solution Providers.
